video.title: Toby's Travelling Circus
video.synopsis: Ringmaster of his own circus, 8-year-old Toby and his circus pals have fun while learning lessons about teamwork and pushing themselves to excel.

episodes.synopsis: When Ringmaster Tony leaves the circus to travel the world, Toby takes his place. / Momo needs a new act for the sell-out show, but Toby is too busy.
episodes.title: Off to See the World / Toby is Magic

episodes.synopsis: When Toby asks the troupe to create new acts, the twins end up squabbling. / Freddo wants to sing in the show, but he can't count and keep time.
episodes.title: Twin Trouble / Fantastic Freddo

episodes.synopsis: Toby's top hat suffers one circus misadventure after another. / When Ling is unable to perform, Dolores steps into her old costume to save the day.
episodes.title: Toby’s Hat / Dolores Flies Again

episodes.synopsis: When a wheel inspector visits, a miscommunication causes him to get the runaround. / Dolores challenges mighty Thor to learn a new talent: dancing.
episodes.title: The Wheel Inspector / Thor on the Floor

episodes.synopsis: Momo's wet costume and Dolores's bloomers vanish from the clothes line. / Dolores makes some banoffee pies that Momo can't help stealing.
episodes.title: High Wire Freddo / Banana Drama

episodes.synopsis: Clara's juggling balls are missing, but everyone comes up with fun substitutes. / A mischeivous Momo accidentally loses Li and Ling's diabolo spool.
episodes.title: Juggle Clara Juggle / The Disappearing Diabolo

episodes.synopsis: Dolores has the Circus Flu and needs a quiet nap, so Toby proposes a silent circus. / Toby's Tin Whistle practice causes noisy chaos and confusion.
episodes.title: Silent Circus / Toby’s Tin Whistle

episodes.synopsis: Thor learns about his true strengths and weaknesses. Freddo decides to balance two custard pies while he walks the high wire -- with messy results.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Thor / High Wire Wobbles

episodes.synopsis: Dolores's family visits with baby Diddums and only Thor can keep him from crying. / Toby's won't wash up, so Dolores chase him around with a wet cloth.
episodes.title: Snow Baby / Helter Skelter

episodes.synopsis: Li and Ling fight over their new act and Clara and Freddo bicker about their routine. / Jango loses his voice, so everyone auditions to sing his part.
episodes.title: Wheel Deal / Here Come the Girls

episodes.synopsis: Li and Ling have an argument right before their next show. / The show heads off to their next destination, but Clara is temporarily left behind.
episodes.title: In and Out / Clara Is Left Behind

episodes.synopsis: Ling is tangled high up on the trapeze, but Toby freezes on his way up to help. / A shoe hunt is on when a wet footprint is found on a ruined poster.
episodes.title: Toby Climbs Up / If the Boot Fits

episodes.synopsis: Li volunteers for Toby's human canonball act, but will she lose her fear before the show? / Thor steps in to fix the dodgems but loses his wrench.
episodes.title: What Goes Up / Dancing Dodgems

episodes.synopsis: Clara and Freddo form a new act with a sink plunger, just as Dolores's sink gets clogged. / High winds cause all the circus posters to blow away.
episodes.title: Plunger Fun / One Hand Clapping

episodes.synopsis: Freddo's look-alike cousin arrives and the two clowns fool Toby with their similarities. / Momo's new toy, Bob the balloon, causes bewilderment.
episodes.title: Clowning Around / Balloons

episodes.synopsis: Thor keeps his new magnet in his chest, causing metal mayhem all over the circus. / It's too hot to rehearse routines, so Thor builds a powerful fan.
episodes.title: Magnetic Mayhem / Heatwave

episodes.synopsis: The Mayor wants to join the circus for an act, but his fear of heights presents a challenge. / Toby creates a new show finale of life-sized puppets.
episodes.title: Mayoral Visit / Puppet Circus

episodes.synopsis: Thor's scrap metal pile provides Freddo with materials for a new act. / Momo's rabbit is accidentally shot from the cannon to a hay field far away.
episodes.title: Scoot, Rattle and Roll / Missing Monkey

episodes.synopsis: Toby and the troupe think of ways to remind the audience to pick up their litter. / The truck breaks down as the circus heads to their next town.
episodes.title: Litter Picking / Parade

episodes.synopsis: Toby's ringmaster hat gets stuck on a freshly painted Helter Skelter. / When Jango's drums are crushed, the troupe improvises a new percussion act.
episodes.title: Pyramid / Jango Bango

episodes.synopsis: Dolores learns to use her laptop to call family, and Toby goes online to find a new act. / A newspaper photographer visits to take pictures of everyone.
episodes.title: Dolores Distraction / Smile Please

episodes.synopsis: The circus needs a new act, so Toby helps Li and Ling come up with a great idea for the high wire. / Everything around the circus is breaking down.
episodes.title: Dizzy Heights / Genny Be Good

episodes.synopsis: When Thor finds some pirate cortumes, Toby decides to create a pirate-themed show. / Momo is given Toby's old yo-yo and becomes tangled in the toy.
episodes.title: Pirate Circus / Ribbons and Strings

episodes.synopsis: Freddo learns to play football from the local team and everyone joins the game. / Toby's new hat inspires new acts, including a bumper cars song.
episodes.title: Action Replay / Tip Top Toby

episodes.synopsis: Delores leaves Toby in charge of show props, which he loses just before the big show. / Li and Ling are grounded when the Thor paints their high wire.
episodes.title: Delores Day Off / Up, Down and March Around

episodes.synopsis: Circus ringmaster Tony visits with a new partner and a brand new act. / Toby plans a surprise Christmas present for curious Momo.
episodes.title: Get In Line / Momo’s Christmas
